{"id":527303172,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1627090626,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"36 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/527303172/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Recover Binary Search Tree","memory":"58 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for a binary tree node.\n * struct TreeNode {\n *     int val;\n *     TreeNode *left;\n *     TreeNode *right;\n *     TreeNode() : val(0), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x) : val(x), left(nullptr), right(nullptr) {}\n *     TreeNode(int x, TreeNode *left, TreeNode *right) : val(x), left(left), right(right) {}\n * };\n */\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    void solve(TreeNode* root,TreeNode* &prev,TreeNode* &f,TreeNode* &s){\n        if(!root) return;\n        solve(root->left,prev,f,s);\n        if(prev->val>root->val){\n            if(!f){\n                f=prev;\n                s=root;\n            }\n            else s=root;\n        }\n        prev=root;\n       solve(root->right,prev,f,s);\n    }\n    void recoverTree(TreeNode* root) {\n        TreeNode *prev=new TreeNode(INT_MIN),*f=NULL,*s=NULL;\n        solve(root,prev,f,s);\n        if(!f || !s) return;\n        swap(f->val,s->val);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"recover-binary-search-tree"}
